messages.authenticationFailed: Authentication failed, please refresh the page and log in again

apiErrors.unknown-error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
apiErrors.invalid-body: Invalid request data. Please check and try again.
apiErrors.internal-error: Server error. Please try again later.
apiErrors.unauthorized: Your session is invalid. Please sign in again.
apiErrors.forbidden: You don't have permission to do this.
apiErrors.auth/invalid-session: Your session is invalid. Please sign in again.
apiErrors.auth/user-exists: This username or email is already in use.
apiErrors.auth/invalid-verification: Invalid code. Please check and try again.
apiErrors.auth/invalid-verification-scenario: This verification action is not supported.
apiErrors.auth/invalid-verification-target: Invalid recipient. Please check the email or account.
apiErrors.auth/verification-email-error: Failed to send the verification email. Please try again later.
apiErrors.auth/verification-not-exists: Verification record not found. Please try again.
apiErrors.auth/verification-already-verified: This code has already been used.
apiErrors.auth/verification-expired: This code has expired. Please request a new one.
apiErrors.auth/invalid-oauth2-provider: This third-party login is not supported.
apiErrors.auth/oauth2-misconfigured: Third-party login is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
apiErrors.auth/oauth2-already-bound: This third-party account is linked to another user.
apiErrors.auth/oauth2-not-bound: This third-party account is not linked to a local account.
apiErrors.users/mc-claims-auth-error: Failed to connect to Minecraft. Please try again.
apiErrors.users/mc-claim-already-bound: This Minecraft record is linked to another user.
apiErrors.users/no-valid-mc-entitlement: No valid Minecraft purchase or entitlement found.
apiErrors.profiles/name-exists: This player name is already taken.
apiErrors.profiles/primary-exists: You already have a primary profile. Please use that one.
apiErrors.profiles/skin-invalid: Invalid skin texture. Please check and try again.
apiErrors.profiles/cape-invalid: Invalid cape texture. Please check and try again.
apiErrors.textures/already-exists: This texture already exists. Please use it instead.
apiErrors.textures/not-exists: This skin texture does not exist.
apiErrors.files/malformed-file: The file is damaged or has an invalid format.
apiErrors.fetch-error: Failed to load data. Please try again later.

validation.minLength: This field must be at least {min} characters
validation.maxLength: This field must be at most {max} characters
validation.emailFormat: Please enter a valid email address
validation.namePattern: Name should be 3-16 characters long. Numbers, letters, and underscores are allowed.

emailSent.title: Password Reset
emailSent.message: An email has been sent to your email address with a link to reset your password.
emailSent.instruction: Please check your inbox and follow the instructions in the email.

bind.title: OAuth2 Binding
bind.alreadyBoundMessage: You have already bound [{provider}] account {id} to your account.
bind.bindingMessage: You are binding [{provider}] account {id} to your account.

bind.title: Mojang Account Verification
bind.bindSuccess: Binding successful. Here is the bound profile information:
bind.missingParams: Missing verification parameters. Please access this page through the correct link.

mcClaim.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the binding for {username}? This action cannot be undone.
mcClaim.noPermissionDelete: No permission to delete this binding
mcClaim.noPermissionUpdate: No permission to update this binding
